snippet: After several weeks of relative calm, fighting broke out in South Sudan on Friday, forcing aid workers to take cover in Bentiu, where more than 40,000 civilians have sought safety at a United Nations base.
abstract: Fighting breaks out in South Sudan, forcing aid workers to take cover in Bentiu, where more than 40,000 civilians have sought safety at United Nations base.
lead_paragraph: After several weeks of relative calm, fighting broke out in South Sudan on Friday, forcing aid workers to take cover in Bentiu, where more than 40,000 civilians have sought safety at a United Nations base.

headline.main: South Sudan: Fighting Erupts After Lull
headline.print_headline: South Sudan: Fighting Erupts After Lull
